member.name: T:V6Soft.WebApi.Accounting.App_Start.BreezeWebApiConfig
member.summary: Inserts the Breeze Web API controller route at the front of all Web API routes
member.remarks: This class is discovered and run during startup; see http://blogs.msdn.com/b/davidebb/archive/2010/10/11/light-up-your-nupacks-with-startup-code-and-webactivator.aspx
